name: hl7.fhir.uv.ipa
title: International Patient Access
description: This IG  describes how an application acting on behalf of a patient can access information about the patient from an clinical records system using a FHIR based API. The clinical records system may be supporting a clinical care provider (e.g. a hospital, or a general practitioner), or a health data exchange, including a national health record system. (built Wed, Jan 3, 2024 16:43+0000+00:00)
author: HL7 International / Patient Care
